name: Moe's Mammoth Rampage
description:
Moe’s Mammoth Rampage is a sidescroller platformer in which you control Moe the Mammoth, darting through the Royal Alberta Museum, collecting artifacts along the way to add to his own personal collection--can you get the highest score?

This game can be played with a mouse or keyboard--all you have to do is jump! Avoid the bottomless pits, watch out for obstacles, and use powerful boosts to become temporarily invincible.

Disclaimer: This game was originally developed for the museum's arcade unit, and might not display correctly on smaller devices.
